alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 01 at 3:48PM EST until February 05 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches, sleet accumulations of between one and two tenths of an inch and ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch possible. * WHERE...Portions of Coastal DownEast, Interior DownEast and Penobscot Valley Maine. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through late Friday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot
